page.title: 02LITTLE MARCLE EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Apart from a few jobs locally for stockmen & other farm workers, the main source of permanent employment is Weston's cider plant at Much Marcle which also has some agricultural jobs. Within fairly easy reach there is a seasonal succession of casual landwork mainly for women. It starts in the winter with raspberry planting continuing with hop tying, strawberry, raspberry & blackcurrant picking, hop processing & apple harvesting (including windfalls) into late autumn. Two small concerns servicing agricultural machinery & vehicles employ a few engineers & mechanics. There are some office jobs at the headquarters of a farming combine, & at a group of small firms in Little Marcle providing agricultural services.
